amendment.description: An amendment numbered 133 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section that nothing in this Act, shall affect any statutory or regulatory restrictions in effect on the date of enacment of this Act (including any withdrawal of Federal land) that may prohibit oil and gas leasing within the area designated as the South Atlantic Planning Area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 42 (Roll no. 41).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Mace.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 42 (Roll no. 41).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
